designs.title: Gradient Mesh Hero
designs.description: Animated OKLCH gradient mesh with GSAP-driven blob drift, hue rotation on CSS custom properties, and typewriter hero text.

designs.title: Glassmorphism Cards
designs.description: Three frosted glass cards with GSAP stagger entrance, hover lift, and inner-element reveal sequences.

designs.title: Analytics Dashboard
designs.description: Full analytics dashboard with GSAP number countup, animated bar charts, panel slide-ins, and hover interactions.

designs.title: Floating Pill Navigation
designs.description: Floating navbar with Flip-powered pill indicator, GSAP nav entrance, and glow pulse effects.

designs.title: Multi-Step Wizard Form
designs.description: 3-step wizard with GSAP step transitions, animated progress bar fill, shake validation, and completion effects.

designs.title: Bento Grid Feature Showcase
designs.description: Mixed-size bento grid with GSAP stagger entrance, scroll reveal, and hover scale interactions.

designs.title: Neon Pricing Table
designs.description: Cyberpunk pricing columns with GSAP glow pulse, staggered card/feature entrance, and neon hover intensification.

designs.title: Testimonial Marquee
designs.description: Dual-row GSAP-powered infinite marquee with smooth timeScale pause on hover and card lift effects.

designs.title: Split Login Screen
designs.description: 50/50 split login with 6 GSAP orbital drift timelines, form stagger entrance, and interactive focus/hover effects.

designs.title: Premium Mega Footer
designs.description: Mega footer with GSAP scroll-reveal columns, newsletter focus glow, subscribe hover effect, and social icon staggers.

designs.title: Kinetic Typography Hero
designs.description: Word-by-word GSAP stagger hero with accent pulse, subtitle timeline, and CTA underline hover animation.

designs.title: Toast Notification Stack
designs.description: 4 toast variants with GSAP slide-in, animated progress bars, dismiss effects, and replay-all functionality.

designs.title: Vertical Sidebar Navigation
designs.description: Collapsible sidebar with GSAP width/opacity transitions, teams expand animation, mobile drawer slide, and multi-element hover effects.

designs.title: GSAP Scroll Showcase
designs.description: Multi-section scroll story demonstrating horizontal scroll, scrub progress bars, parallax depth layers, number countup, and pinned fade sequences.

designs.title: GSAP Text Effects
designs.description: Typography animation gallery with typewriter, character reveal, word bounce, scramble decode, gradient sweep, line slide, and scale-blur effects.

designs.title: GSAP Flip Gallery
designs.description: Interactive gallery with Flip-powered layout switching (grid, list, masonry) and category filtering with smooth position animations.

designs.title: GSAP Micro Interactions
designs.description: Collection of GSAP micro-interactions: magnetic/ripple/elastic buttons, slide/bounce/liquid toggles, floating labels, tilt cards, and loading animations.

designs.title: Command Palette
designs.description: macOS Spotlight / VS Code style command palette with search filtering, grouped results (Recent, Actions, Files), keyboard navigation, GSAP overlay fade, modal scaleIn, stagger entrance, and highlight glow.

designs.title: Chat Widget
designs.description: Floating Intercom-style chat widget with circular bubble trigger, unread badge, expandable chat window, alternating user/agent messages, GSAP typing dots animation, message slide-in, and bubble pulse effects.

designs.title: Data Table
designs.description: Professional data table with sortable columns, row selection, bulk actions bar, pagination controls, and GSAP stagger entrance animations.

designs.title: Kanban Board
designs.description: Trello-style kanban board with 4 status columns, task cards with priority labels and tags, inline new task form, and GSAP column/card stagger entrance.

designs.title: Feature Comparison
designs.description: 3-tier feature comparison table with monthly/yearly toggle, animated price countup, check/cross indicators, Popular badge, and GSAP column stagger entrance.

designs.title: Team Showcase
designs.description: 3x2 team member grid with GSAP 3D rotateY card flip on hover, stagger scaleIn with ScrollTrigger, social icon reveals, and avatar glow pulse.

designs.title: FAQ Accordion
designs.description: FAQ section with searchable accordion, category tab filtering via GSAP Flip, height-animated open/close, and CTA card with ambient border glow.

designs.title: File Upload Dropzone
designs.description: Drag-and-drop file upload card with dashed dropzone, simulated multi-file upload with animated progress bars, completion checkmarks, error shake with retry, cancel/remove rows, and upload summary counter.

designs.title: Blog Post Layout
designs.description: Premium editorial blog post with hero section, sticky TOC sidebar, reading progress bar, share sidebar, related articles grid, and GSAP scroll-driven animations.

designs.title: Image Gallery Lightbox
designs.description: Masonry image gallery with gradient placeholders, hover overlay with zoom icon, fullscreen lightbox with GSAP scale entrance, slide transitions between images, keyboard navigation (arrows + escape), and image counter.

designs.title: Sticky Header
designs.description: Partially persistent sticky header with scroll-triggered shrink, hide on scroll down, reveal on scroll up, mobile hamburger, and demo content sections.

designs.title: Tab Bar
designs.description: Horizontal tab bar with GSAP Flip-powered sliding underline indicator, spring-physics animation, icon+text tabs, badge counts, keyboard navigation, and scrollable mobile tabs.

designs.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
designs.description: Hierarchical breadcrumb with 3 style variants (simple, pill, icon), collapsible ellipsis dropdown, tooltip on truncated items, stagger entrance, and interactive content switching.

designs.title: Pagination Controls
designs.description: 3 pagination variants (classic numbered, prev/next, load more) with skeleton loading transition, page content stagger, GSAP scale on active page, and go-to-page input.

designs.title: Video Hero
designs.description: Full-viewport hero with GSAP-driven living gradient background, word-by-word text reveal, TextPlugin typewriter subtitle, floating geometric particles, play button pulse rings, and scroll indicator.

designs.title: Minimal Footer
designs.description: Compact footer with centered and split layout variants, 3 link columns, social icons, newsletter signup with focus glow, GSAP scroll-reveal entrance, and hover underline animations.

designs.title: Stats Counter
designs.description: KPI metrics section with 4 stat cards featuring scroll-triggered GSAP countup numbers, trend indicators, sparkline charts, stagger entrance, and hover lift.

designs.title: Timeline
designs.description: Vertical timeline with alternating left/right cards, self-drawing center line via ScrollTrigger scrub, color-coded status dots, date markers, and scroll-reveal card entrance.

designs.title: Logo Cloud
designs.description: Dual-row infinite marquee logo section with opposite scroll directions, grayscale-to-color hover, timeScale pause on hover, featured partners cards, and scroll-reveal entrance.

designs.title: Product Card Grid
designs.description: 3x2 e-commerce product grid with gradient image placeholders, badges, SVG star ratings, Add to Cart micro-interaction, wishlist heart toggle, and GSAP Flip filter re-arrangement.

designs.title: Notification Center
designs.description: Bell icon notification dropdown with unread badge, grouped sections, read/unread distinction, tab filtering, swipe dismiss, mark-all-read animation, and GSAP dropdown timeline.

designs.title: Settings Page
designs.description: Full-page settings with sidebar navigation, 5 content sections (Profile, Security, Notifications, Billing, API), GSAP-animated toggle switches, form validation, and cross-fade section transitions.

designs.title: 404 Error Page
designs.description: Creative 404 page with GSAP glitch chromatic aberration effect, floating geometric orbital scene, click easter egg, search input expand, ambient particle motion, and branded CTAs.

designs.title: Stats Dashboard
designs.description: Full dashboard with 4 KPI cards (countup, sparklines, trend arrows), bar chart with hover tooltips, activity feed, top products ranking, traffic sources, and GSAP stagger entrance.

designs.title: Loading States
designs.description: Showcase of 6 loading patterns: skeleton screen, spinner, progress bar, dot loader, shimmer card, and content placeholder with GSAP-powered animations and per-card replay buttons.
